text: I want to grab all the users from the userbase, but then only loop through 10 of them (I'm leaving out code that would explain why I wouldn't just grab 10 users from the db in the first place).

code:
users = User.objects.all()
i = 0
while i < 10:
    for user in users:
        if user.is_active:
            # do something
            i += 1

text: This is creating an endless loop... What stupid detail am I missing?
